law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commissioner" means the Commissioner of Labor and Industry.

section.section: "Employer" means a contractor or subcontractor that has a State contract for services valued at $100,000 or more.

"Employer" does not include a contractor or subcontractor that:
employs 10 or fewer employees; and
has a State contract for services valued at less than $500,000.

text.section: "Living wage" means an hourly wage set as provided under § 18-103 of this title.
"Tier 1 area" includes Montgomery County, Prince George's County, Howard County, Anne Arundel County, Baltimore County, and Baltimore City.
"Tier 2 area" includes any county in the State not included in the Tier 1 area.
